title: I feel like Diana lost a ton of attack speed due to runes
body: Almost every Diana player (I'm talking about Diana mains) used attack speed runes per runes reforged. Now it seems like you have to go out of your way to build or spec into attack speed to get it back. Diana has a very low base attack speed as well so building attack speed doesn't ramp up her attack speed as much as it feels like it should. I don't like the way her e works with attack speed. I feel like the whole Dianas passive thing is a wasted mechanic woth the current state of the game. In no way am I saying that Diana is weak in fact I think she is rather strong being the only burst assassin left in the game (lol). I guess I just feel like her kit overall right now is lacking what it should be.

yea but i feel like if they gave her an attack speed boost she could be a viable top lane pick where the rest of the bruisers are. If I had a say in the way Diana would be changed it would be to remove the E attack speed boost, make every auto deal magic damage and have higher base attack speed, lower Q damage to compensate and make her W a give a small sheild on 3rd auto attack. That would make her a bruiser instead of a burst mage.

I'm not a Diana main and i don't play her much but when i pick her i always enjoy the game and i feel she is pretty strong right now. 

Those changes would make her viable more for top than mid. Q is the only early game source of damage she has to poke/farm in lane against ranged champions, lowering damage would make her midlane (95% of midlaners are ranged) really bad. You would also lose her burst potential on top of bad laning phase. 

For top lane it could be great since getting extra damage from every auto and a bit of extra shield could help against melee champions.

But then again there are plenty of toplaners better than that ^^
